subject: Re: [junit] Unit 4.0 release candidate 2 Test ordering
msgSnippet: There is however value in the concept of dependency. I ve come across situations where if one test failed then a number of other tests would be guarenteed to
messageBody:
There is however value in the concept of dependency. I've come across
situations where if one test failed then a number of other tests would be
guarenteed to fail. The failure of the latter tests would make it more
difficult to spot the root cause. I know that some will argue that I should
use more mocks to reduce dependancies. But I have come across situations
where that just didn't do the trick.

Mark
----------------------------------------------------------------------
